message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a unique asset that will bring significant value to your business. I'm willing to start with an offer of $1200000. Is this something you'd like to consider?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1100000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to my business.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I was hoping to get closer to my initial asking price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $1150000. This is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to your business, and it's a significant discount from my initial offer.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm willing to pay $1080000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to my business and the market conditions.

I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, Bob. However, I'm still not comfortable going below $1120000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $1100000, which is just $20000 above your previous offer. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value and the market conditions.

I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still not convinced that $1100000 is the right price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I'm thinking more along the lines of $1050000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to my business and the market conditions.

I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, Bob. However, I'm starting to get concerned that we're getting close to the point where I may need to consider other options. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to get closer to my target price. I'm willing to offer the product to you for $1080000. This is the highest price I'm willing to go, and I think it's still a fair price considering the product's value and the market conditions.

I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still not convinced that $1080000 is the right price for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to my business and the market conditions.

I'm starting to feel that we're getting close to a point where I may need to consider other options, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my target price. I'm willing to offer the product to you for $1080000, just like in round 7. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value and the market conditions. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll need to consider other options.

I appreciate your time and effort, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $1050000, which is the lowest price I'm willing to pay. If you're not willing to accept this price, I'll have to consider buying the product from John for $1000000.
